contentList.content: You have honed your senses to the utmost degree. You gain a +[1] bonus to Initiative, can't be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SURPRISED">Surprised</LSTag>, and attackers can't land <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hits</LSTag> against you.
After making a weapon or unarmed attack, you can cast a spell as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">bonus action</LSTag>.
When you cast a damaging spell, add your <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>" to the damage it deals.
You seek mastery over mind and body. Your Ki connects you to the Weave.
You only take half damage from falling.
You are immune to being <LSTag Tooltip="CharmedGroup">Charmed</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>.

Punch twice in quick succession and Stagger the target, making it unable to take reactions.

From Monk Level 5 onwards, the target will possibly be Stunned.

Arcane energy infuses your strikes. Your melee unarmed attacks deal an additional [1].

Whenever you deal damage with a melee unarmed attack, you gain Arcane Acuity for 2 turns.
While in combat, you heal [1] every turn, and restore [2] <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="KiPoint">Ki Point(s)</LSTag>.
